paper_abstract: Methods of improving the decompilation quality, that is, the reconstruction of a program in a high-level language from a given program in a low-level language, are considered. Decompilation is considered as a reverse engineering problem; problems of decompilation quality are examined, and metrics for assessing this quality are proposed.
paper_title: Using information obtained in the course of program execution for improving the quality of data type reconstruction in decompilation
